attributes.action: encourage Blackpool Council to only use energy efficient bulbs for the Illuminations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blackpool Illuminations is a historic event, bringing enjoyment to many children and boosting the local economy.

However, the amount of electricity it uses should also be historic. The general public is always being told to use dim energy efficient bulbs, to save energy and the environment. Just think of the good that could be done if the thousands of bulbs in the Illuminations all went Green!
